original: de ltar rgyu dag dang ni rkyen dag las //
analyzed: de ltar rgyu dag dang ni rkyen dag las //
translated: Thus,

original: zhes bya ba ni las dang ma rig pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni las dang ma rig pa la sogs pas so //
translated: This is due to karma, ignorance, and so on.

original: 'du byed gyur pa thams cad 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: 'du byed gyur pa thams cad 'byung ba ste //
translated: All the formations that occur

original: zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa rnams skye ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa rnams skye ba'o //
translated: This is the arising of form, feeling, and so on.

original: rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis ni ma rig pa la sogs pa yang dag par mthong ba ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis ni ma rig pa la sogs pa yang dag par mthong ba ste /
translated: The yogis and yoginis see ignorance and so on.

original: ci lta ba bzhin du gnas pa'i de kho na nyid mthong bas 'du byed stong pa ste gdod ma nas skye ba med par ro //
analyzed: ci lta ba bzhin du gnas pa'i de kho na nyid mthong bas 'du byed stong pa ste gdod ma nas skye ba med par ro //
translated: They see formations as empty, unborn from the beginning,

original: yo ba med pa ste bya ba med par mthong ba'o //
analyzed: yo ba med pa ste bya ba med par mthong ba'o //
translated: and as unmoving, seeing them as inactive.

original: de nyid rgyas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid rgyas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that very point extensively, he says:

original: phung po dag dang zhes bya ba la sogs @159b pa gsungs te /
analyzed: phung po dag dang zhes bya ba la sogs @159b pa gsungs te /
translated: The aggregates, the elements, and the sense bases🔽are empty of their own entities.

original: nang yang stong la zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa nang gi bdag nyid can rnams stong pa ste /🔽rnam par dpyad na mi 'thad pas so //
analyzed: nang yang stong la zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa nang gi bdag nyid can rnams stong pa ste /🔽rnam par dpyad na mi 'thad pas so //
translated: The inner is empty, and the outer is also empty.🔽The inner, which has the nature of the eyes and so on, is empty because it is untenable when analyzed.

original: phyi rol stong pa ste zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa rnams stong pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol stong pa ste zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa rnams stong pa'o //
translated: External emptiness means the emptiness of external forms, etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: bdag nyid kun gyis stong zhing zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: bdag nyid kun gyis stong zhing zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: it is said, “empty of all things.”

original: gnas med la zhes bya ba ni yul med pa'o //
analyzed: gnas med la zhes bya ba ni yul med pa'o //
translated: Without location means without an object.

original: de nyid dpe'i sgo nas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: de nyid dpe'i sgo nas bstan par bya ba'i phyir / chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: In order to teach that very thing by means of an example,🔽the root text says, “The nature of phenomena is like the nature of space.”

original: ces bya ba ni chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that all phenomena are like space.

original: des na gal te rnam par dpyad pa byas pa de'i tshe chos thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can yin par rnam par dpyad na 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na gal te rnam par dpyad pa byas pa de'i tshe chos thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can yin par rnam par dpyad na 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, if one analyzes in this way, if one analyzes the characteristic of phenomena as being like space, then mundane conventions will be destroyed.

original: de ltar rnam par dpyad pa'i dbang du byas te kun rdzob kyi rnam gzhag bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par dpyad pa'i dbang du byas te kun rdzob kyi rnam gzhag bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the presentation of the conventional in this way from the perspective of analysis,

original: da ni kun rdzob rdzas su yod pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir phyogs snga ma ston pa ni ci ste yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: da ni kun rdzob rdzas su yod pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir phyogs snga ma ston pa ni ci ste yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
